title: Diabetes management education through escape game-based learning

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational health management knowledge
context.additional_context: Focuses on designing simple learning activities via smartphones, with educational content structured for immediate application to daily tasks by professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of blood glucose management and dietary control methods for diabetic patients with over 80% accuracy
Learners can suggest three or more appropriate coping strategies when analyzing real-world cases for preventing diabetic complications
Learners can accurately perform five insulin administration procedures and precautions through virtual scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
